title: Casting Aluminum Alloys {BBS}
description:
This monograph summarizes research conducted at Moscow Institute of Steel and Alloy during many decades in part together with Alcoa Inc. The research covered areas of the structure, properties, thermal resistance, corrosion and fatigue of aluminum alloys in industrial manufacturing.

Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Mathematical models for alloy mechanical properties facilitating the down-selection of best prospect candidates for new alloy development
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· New principles of design of eutectic casting aluminium alloys
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Examples of successful novel casting alloy development, including alloys for high-strength applications, alloys with transition metals, and novel alloys utilizing aluminium scrap
